process_eq ( $  Str,
$  Changed 
)

Function processes macro 'eq'.

Parameters:
$Str - String to process.
$Changed - true if any of the page's elements was compiled.
Returns:
array( Processed string , Was the string changed ).
Exceptions:
Exception - An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 91 of file math_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Limitations = array( 'value1' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'value2' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
                        
                        for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'eq' , $Limitations ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
                              
                              list( $Val1 , $Val2 ) = $this->BlockSettings->get_settings( 'value1,value2' );
                              
                              $Str = str_replace( "{eq:$Parameters}" , $Val1 == $Val2 ? 1 : 0 , $Str );
                              
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

Definition at line 453 of file math_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'even' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
                              
                              if( intval( $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'value' ) ) % 2 == 0 )
                              {
                                    $Str = str_replace( 
                                          "{even:$Parameters}" , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'content' ) , $Str 
                                    );
                              }
                              else
                              {
                                    $Str = str_replace( "{even:$Parameters}" , '' , $Str );
                              }
                              
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }

process_if ( $  Str,
$  Changed 
)

Function processes macro 'if'.

Parameters:
$Str - String to process.
$Changed - true if any of the page's elements was compiled.

array( Processed string , Was the string changed ).

Exception - An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:

Definition at line 509 of file math_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Limitations = array( 'cond' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'condition' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
                        
                        for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'if' , $Limitations ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
                              
                              $Cond = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'condition' , false );
                              $Then = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'then' , '' );
                              $Else = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'else' , '' );

                              $Str = str_replace( "{if:$Parameters}" , $Cond == 0 ? $Else : $Then , $Str );

                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

process_map ( $  Str,
$  Changed 
)

Function processes macro 'map'.

Parameters:
$Str - String to process.
$Changed - true if any of the page's elements was compiled.
Returns:
array( Processed string , Was the string changed ).
Exceptions:
Exception - An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 562 of file math_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Limitations = array( 
                              'first' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'second' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'value' => TERMINAL_VALUE
                        );
                        
                        for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'map' , $Limitations ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
                              $Value = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'value' , false );
                              
                              $First = explode( '|' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'first' , '' ) );
                              $Second = explode( '|' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'second' , '' ) );
                              
                              $Template = '';
                              
                              foreach( $First as $k => $v )
                              {
                                    if( $v == $Value )
                                    {
                                          $Template = $Second[ $k ];
                                          break;
                                    }
                              }
                              
                              $Str = str_replace( "{map:$Parameters}" , $Template , $Str );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

                        list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_if( $Str , $Changed );
